posts.post_content:
She's a frickin nuclear missile in limited. You play her and if she survives two or three turns you pretty much just win the game right there. RoE is kind of low on removal that can make her go completely away and prevent you from just killing everything your opponent has.  
[Nirkana Revenant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nirkana Revenant) anyone? "So I'll just tap my seven swamps for 14 mana, kill your two [Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel)s and swing for 14 in the air."  
Amazingly flavorful and cool and good looking etc. and I want to marry her for winning me so many games in the prerelease but she's not going to see constructed play outside of casual. [Malakir Bloodwitch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Malakir Bloodwitch) just has a much more relevant ability in being able to shrug off half the removal in standard.
posts.html:
She's a frickin nuclear missile in limited. You play her and if she survives two or three turns you pretty much just win the game right there. RoE is kind of low on removal that can make her go completely away and prevent you from just killing everything your opponent has.
Nirkana Revenant anyone? "So I'll just tap my seven swamps for 14 mana, kill your two Baneslayer Angels and swing for 14 in the air."
Amazingly flavorful and cool and good looking etc. and I want to marry her for winning me so many games in the prerelease but she's not going to see constructed play outside of casual. Malakir Bloodwitch just has a much more relevant ability in being able to shrug off half the removal in standard.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Exart (4/19/2010 1:10:34 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Pump AND creature kill, simultaneously on a fat flyer.  
Pretty much a black [Flameblast Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flameblast Dragon).  
Most glorious.  
  
Plus she's not too bad to look at (beyond the obvious ;D ); the fire/blood looks cool, and she is probably the best example to date of Zendikar Vampire's cultural norm of making armor and clothes out of the spoils of the giant swamp insects.
posts.html:
Pump AND creature kill, simultaneously on a fat flyer.
Pretty much a black Flameblast Dragon.
Most glorious.

Plus she's not too bad to look at (beyond the obvious ;D ); the fire/blood looks cool, and she is probably the best example to date of Zendikar Vampire's cultural norm of making armor and clothes out of the spoils of the giant swamp insects.

Posted By: DutchSanta (4/18/2010 11:10:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card is so insane I don't understand why black gets everything these days. As others have said this is a better flameblast/mordant dragon, and it's in the same set as nirkana revenant. There's really not much you can say about this card that isn't good. It has some real strength as a vampire heavy hitter, being one of the better finishers even if you aren't playing any other vampires.
